ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales: Dance of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lost in the maze of the mysterious Tower, Jasmine, Mystere, and Bakur are now on the run for their lives from the deadly residents who reside within. As they try to figure out the puzzle they are trapped inside, time to escape may be running out along with their chances of survival.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Ediano Silva & Sanju Nivangune | 1 | B | Cover B | Netho Diaz & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Ula Mos | 3 | D | Cover D | Meguro | 4 | Note: The digital edition (4/25/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
